name: Long May the Night / 常夜相簿
name_original: Long May the Night / 常夜相簿
description:
A short AVG about a broken world of never-ending night sealed in a photo. Acting as the vampire duke, reclaim your vampire power to repair this long night. 

Provide English and 简体中文.

Made for , "Long nights"\"Caught on camera" themes.

Also (maybe) fits in , "Vampires"\"Blood is lethal" themes,
